title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 62.3 - Sheep and goats
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 62.3 - Sheep and goats

State Regulations
(a) Sheep and goats may be moved directly to a recognized slaughtering
establishment or specifically approved stockyard in the State under the
provisions of section
62.4
of this Part. (b) All other sheep and goats moving into the

State shall be accompanied by an approved certificate of veterinary
inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
62.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
